articles.title: Pioneering rocker Jerry Lee Lewis dead at 87 - News24
articles.description: Jerry Lee Lewis, a kingpin of 1950s American rock and roll who played a pivotal role in shaping the genre's sound, died on Friday. He was 87 years old.
articles.content:
• American rocker Jerry Lee Lewis has died. He was 87 years old.
  • Lewis, is best known for his classic Great Balls of Fire.
  • His publicist told AFP he died of natural causes.
